input.sentences: the logo of the restaurant is very clean and sleek .
i read the menu with my girlfriend .
we decided to get a couple of glasses of the finest alcohol .
we waited for our food to be delivered to our table .
when our food got there | our table was full of entrees .
output.sentences: The group decided to hit up this new, trendy restaurant they'd heard so much about.
The menu had so many options!
A round of waters was brought out as the group decided.
The appetizer was huge and came with plenty of rice!
It was great, and filling, night for the group of friends.
